CustomField.description: This indicates the date/time the rule last returned zero records by user. Stored as a JSON text string with user salesforce Ids and UTC time. This is used in the Rule Frequency Minutes evaluation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This indicates the date/time the rule last returned zero records by user. Stored as a JSON text string with user salesforce Ids and UTC time. This is used in the Rule Frequency Minutes evaluation.
CustomField.label: User Last Ran With Zero Records
